00027 // This function gets called every hour, on the hour.
00028 // It spawns the handling of all sorts of stuff:
00029 // Morale changes, assignment progress, town loyalties, etc.
00030 
00031 void HandleHourlyUpdate()
00032 {
00033       //if the game hasnt even started yet ( we havent arrived in the sector ) dont process this
00034       if ( DidGameJustStart() )
00035             return;
00036 
00037       // hourly update of town loyalty    
00038       HandleTownLoyalty();
00039 
00040       // hourly update of team assignments
00041       UpdateAssignments();
00042 
00043       // hourly update of hated/liked mercs
00044       UpdateBuddyAndHatedCounters();
00045 
00046       // update morale!
00047       HourlyMoraleUpdate();
00048 
00049       // degrade camouflage
00050       HourlyCamouflageUpdate();
00051 
00052       // check mines for monster infestation/extermination
00053       HourlyMinesUpdate();
00054 
00055       // check how well the player is doing right now
00056       HourlyProgressUpdate();
00057 
00058       // do any quest stuff necessary
00059       HourlyQuestUpdate();
00060 
00061       HourlyLarryUpdate();
00062 
00063       HourlyCheckIfSlayAloneSoHeCanLeave();
00064 
00065       PayOffSkyriderDebtIfAny();
00066 
00067 
00068       if ( GetWorldHour() % 6 == 0 ) // 4 times a day
00069       {
00070             UpdateRegenCounters();
00071       }
00072 }
00073 
00074 void UpdateRegenCounters( void )
00075 {
00076       UINT8 ubID;
00077             
00078       for ( ubID = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID; ubID <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; ubID++ )
00079       {
00080             if ( MercPtrs[ ubID ]->bRegenBoostersUsedToday > 0 )
00081             {
00082                   MercPtrs[ ubID ]->bRegenBoostersUsedToday--;
00083             }
00084       }
00085 }

00087 void HandleQuarterHourUpdate()
00088 {
00089       //if the game hasnt even started yet ( we havent arrived in the sector ) dont process this
00090       if ( DidGameJustStart() )
00091             return;
00092 
00093   DecayTacticalMoraleModifiers( );
00094 }

00096 
00097 void HourlyQuestUpdate( void )
00098 {
00099       UINT32 uiHour = GetWorldHour();
00100 
00101       // brothel 
00102       if ( uiHour == 4 )
00103       {
00104             SetFactFalse( FACT_BROTHEL_OPEN );
00105       }
00106       else if ( uiHour == 20 )
00107       {
00108             SetFactTrue( FACT_BROTHEL_OPEN );
00109       }
00110 
00111       // bar/nightclub
00112       if ( uiHour == 15 )
00113       {
00114             UINT8 ubLoop;
00115 
00116             SetFactTrue( FACT_CLUB_OPEN );
00117             SetFactFalse( FACT_PAST_CLUB_CLOSING_AND_PLAYER_WARNED );
00118             
00119             // reset boxes fought
00120             for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < NUM_BOXERS; ubLoop++ )
00121             {
00122                   gfBoxerFought[ ubLoop ] = FALSE;
00123             }
00124 
00125             // if # of boxing matches the player has won is a multiple of
00126             // 3, and the boxers haven't rested, then make them rest
00127             if ( gfBoxersResting )
00128             {
00129                   // done resting now!
00130                   gfBoxersResting = FALSE;
00131                   gubBoxersRests++;
00132             }
00133             else if ( gubBoxingMatchesWon / 3 > gubBoxersRests )
00134             {
00135                   // time for the boxers to rest!
00136                   gfBoxersResting = TRUE;
00137             }
00138       }
00139       else if ( uiHour == 2 )
00140       {
00141             SetFactFalse( FACT_CLUB_OPEN );
00142       }
00143 
00144       // museum
00145       if ( uiHour == 9 )
00146       {
00147             SetFactTrue( FACT_MUSEUM_OPEN );
00148       }
00149       else if ( uiHour == 18 )
00150       {
00151             SetFactFalse( FACT_MUSEUM_OPEN );
00152       }
00153 
00154 }

00156 #define BAR_TEMPTATION 4
00157 #define NUM_LARRY_ITEMS 6
00158 UINT16      LarryItems[ NUM_LARRY_ITEMS ][ 3 ] =
00159 {
00160       // item, temptation, points to use
00161       { ADRENALINE_BOOSTER,         5, 100 },
00162       {     ALCOHOL,                                        BAR_TEMPTATION, 25  },
00163       { MEDICKIT,                                     4, 10  },
00164       {     WINE,                                                 3, 50  },
00165       { REGEN_BOOSTER,                    3, 100 },
00166       {     BEER,                                                 2, 100 },
00167 };
00168 
00169 #define LARRY_FALLS_OFF_WAGON 8
00170 
00171 void HourlyLarryUpdate( void )
00172 {
00173       SOLDIERTYPE *                 pSoldier;
00174       INT8                                      bSlot, bBoozeSlot;
00175       INT8                                      bLarryItemLoop;
00176       UINT16                                    usTemptation = 0;
00177       UINT16                                    usCashAmount;
00178       BOOLEAN                                   fBar = FALSE;
00179 
00180       pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( LARRY_NORMAL, TRUE );
00181       if ( !pSoldier )
00182       {
00183             pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( LARRY_DRUNK, TRUE );
00184       }
00185       if ( pSoldier )
00186       {
00187             if ( pSoldier->bAssignment >= ON_DUTY )
00188             {
00189                   return;
00190             }
00191             if ( pSoldier->fBetweenSectors )
00192             {
00193                   return;
00194             }
00195             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && (gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector || guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN ) )
00196             {
00197                   return;
00198             }
00199 
00200             // look for items in Larry's inventory to maybe use
00201             for ( bLarryItemLoop = 0; bLarryItemLoop < NUM_LARRY_ITEMS; bLarryItemLoop++ )
00202             {
00203                   bSlot = FindObj( pSoldier, LarryItems[ bLarryItemLoop ][ 0 ] );
00204                   if ( bSlot != NO_SLOT )
00205                   {
00206                         usTemptation = LarryItems[ bLarryItemLoop ][ 1 ];
00207                         break;
00208                   }
00209             }
00210 
00211             // check to see if we're in a bar sector, if we are, we have access to alcohol 
00212             // which may be better than anything we've got...
00213             if ( usTemptation < BAR_TEMPTATION && GetCurrentBalance() >= Item[ ALCOHOL ].usPrice )
00214             {
00215                   if ( pSoldier->bSectorZ == 0 && 
00216                                     ( ( pSoldier->sSectorX == 13 && pSoldier->sSectorY == MAP_ROW_B) ||
00217                                           ( pSoldier->sSectorX == 13 && pSoldier->sSectorY == MAP_ROW_C) ||
00218                                           ( pSoldier->sSectorX == 5 && pSoldier->sSectorY == MAP_ROW_C) ||
00219                                           ( pSoldier->sSectorX == 6 && pSoldier->sSectorY == MAP_ROW_C) ||
00220                                           ( pSoldier->sSectorX == 5 && pSoldier->sSectorY == MAP_ROW_D) ||
00221                                           ( pSoldier->sSectorX == 2 && pSoldier->sSectorY == MAP_ROW_H) 
00222                                     )
00223                         )
00224                   {
00225                         // in a bar!
00226                         fBar = TRUE;
00227                         usTemptation = BAR_TEMPTATION;
00228                   }
00229             }                 
00230 
00231             if ( usTemptation > 0 )
00232             {     
00233                   if ( pSoldier->ubProfile == LARRY_NORMAL )
00234                   {
00235                         gMercProfiles[ LARRY_NORMAL ].bNPCData += (INT8) Random( usTemptation );
00236                         if ( gMercProfiles[ LARRY_NORMAL ].bNPCData >= LARRY_FALLS_OFF_WAGON )
00237                         {
00238                               if ( fBar )
00239                               {
00240                                     // take $ from player's account
00241                                     usCashAmount = Item[ ALCOHOL ].usPrice;
00242                                     AddTransactionToPlayersBook ( TRANSFER_FUNDS_TO_MERC, pSoldier->ubProfile, GetWorldTotalMin() , -( usCashAmount ) );
00243                                     // give Larry some booze and set slot etc values appropriately
00244                                     bBoozeSlot = FindEmptySlotWithin( pSoldier, HANDPOS, SMALLPOCK8POS );
00245                                     if ( bBoozeSlot != NO_SLOT )
00246                                     {
00247                                           // give Larry booze here
00248                                           CreateItem( ALCOHOL, 100, &(pSoldier->inv[bBoozeSlot]) );
00249                                     }
00250                                     bSlot = bBoozeSlot;
00251                                     bLarryItemLoop = 1;
00252                               }
00253                               // ahhhh!!!
00254                               SwapLarrysProfiles( pSoldier );
00255                               if ( bSlot != NO_SLOT )
00256                               {
00257                                     UseKitPoints( &(pSoldier->inv[ bSlot ]), LarryItems[ bLarryItemLoop ][ 2 ], pSoldier );
00258                               }
00259                         }
00260                   }
00261                   else
00262                   {
00263                         // NB store all drunkenness info in LARRY_NORMAL profile (to use same values)
00264                         // so long as he keeps consuming, keep number above level at which he cracked
00265                         gMercProfiles[ LARRY_NORMAL ].bNPCData = __max( gMercProfiles[ LARRY_NORMAL ].bNPCData, LARRY_FALLS_OFF_WAGON );
00266                         gMercProfiles[ LARRY_NORMAL ].bNPCData += (INT8) Random( usTemptation );
00267                         // allow value to keep going up to 24 (about 2 days since we subtract Random( 2 ) when he has no access )
00268                         gMercProfiles[ LARRY_NORMAL ].bNPCData = __min( gMercProfiles[ LARRY_NORMAL ].bNPCData, 24 );
00269                         if ( fBar )
00270                         {
00271                               // take $ from player's account
00272                               usCashAmount = Item[ ALCOHOL ].usPrice;
00273                               AddTransactionToPlayersBook ( TRANSFER_FUNDS_TO_MERC, pSoldier->ubProfile, GetWorldTotalMin() , -( usCashAmount ) );
00274                               // give Larry some booze and set slot etc values appropriately
00275                               bBoozeSlot = FindEmptySlotWithin( pSoldier, HANDPOS, SMALLPOCK8POS );
00276                               if ( bBoozeSlot != NO_SLOT )
00277                               {
00278                                     // give Larry booze here
00279                                     CreateItem( ALCOHOL, 100, &(pSoldier->inv[bBoozeSlot]) );
00280                               }
00281                               bSlot = bBoozeSlot;
00282                               bLarryItemLoop = 1;
00283                         }
00284                         if ( bSlot != NO_SLOT )
00285                         {
00286                               // ahhhh!!!
00287                               UseKitPoints( &(pSoldier->inv[ bSlot ]), LarryItems[ bLarryItemLoop ][ 2 ], pSoldier );
00288                         }
00289                   }
00290             }
00291             else if ( pSoldier->ubProfile == LARRY_DRUNK )
00292             {
00293                   gMercProfiles[ LARRY_NORMAL ].bNPCData -= (INT8) Random( 2 );
00294                   if ( gMercProfiles[ LARRY_NORMAL ].bNPCData <= 0 )
00295                   {
00296                         // goes sober!
00297                         SwapLarrysProfiles( pSoldier );
00298                   }
00299             }
00300 
00301       }
00302       
00303 }
00304 
00305 void HourlyCheckIfSlayAloneSoHeCanLeave()
00306 {
00307       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
00308       pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( SLAY, TRUE );
00309       if( !pSoldier )
00310       {
00311             return;
00312       }
00313       if( pSoldier->fBetweenSectors )
00314       {
00315             return;
00316       }
00317       if( !pSoldier->bActive || !pSoldier->bLife )
00318       {
00319             return;
00320       }
00321       if( PlayerMercsInSector( (UINT8)pSoldier->sSectorX, (UINT8)pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ ) == 1 )
00322       {
00323             if( Chance( 15 ) )
00324             {
00325                   pSoldier->ubLeaveHistoryCode = HISTORY_SLAY_MYSTERIOUSLY_LEFT;
00326                   TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( pSoldier, 0, DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_CONTRACT_ENDING_NO_ASK_EQUIP, 0, 0 );
00327             }
00328       }
00329 }
